summary: A Django TestCase suite that validates the behavior of a swappable model, confirming that it can be overridden via project settings, supports case‑insensitive queries, and correctly creates associated article data, permissions, and content‑type records.
business_intent: To guarantee that the swappable model infrastructure functions reliably, allowing developers to replace the model through configuration while preserving query behavior and automatically generating the necessary permissions and content‑type entries, thereby ensuring flexibility and data consistency in the application.
